description: Detects wceaux.dll access while WCE pass-the-hash remote command execution on source host Author: Thomas Patzke. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: WCE wceaux.dll Access
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:("4656" OR "4658" OR "4660" OR "4663") AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:*\\wceaux.dll)
